name: eslint-plugin-react-pure-export
description: ESLint plugin to enforce separation between React components and pure logic modules

scripts.version: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run lint && npm version patch -m 'chore: release v%s' && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run lint && npm version minor -m 'chore: release v%s' && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run lint && npm version major -m 'chore: release v%s' && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
